subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Frans Nielsen scored the deciding goal in a shootout, and the Islanders earned their third straight win by beating the host Carolina Hurricanes in a matchup of the Eastern Conference’s bottom two teams.
snippet: Frans Nielsen scored the deciding goal in a shootout, and the Islanders earned their third straight win by beating the host Carolina Hurricanes in a matchup of the Eastern Conference’s bottom two teams.
